topic.title: ZN Discussion + Competitors
topic.body:
Discussion:
https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=15384046

Alternatives mentioned:
https://datproject.org/
https://www.archain.org/
https://substratum.net/technology/

I hope BFS (bigFileSuport) for ZN come soon, so no need for alternatives.

23_1H5UJ7LneToGqYqJ9fbLnu1Ko2pxTpchof.body:
> [nofish](#comment_1016_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Yeah, I found a bug, then gone for a beer with people who came to last Firday's meetup and the day has passed quickly.I just fixed the problem and working on the commits again. [...]

would be good to release it. then people will test and report more bugs.
